gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: The data used in this study were produced by the MISR Science Team;processed/stored at the Langley DAAC;Product is the MISR Level 3 Global Albedo product in netCDF format for a day;See ProductionDateTime for Published date.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: MISR Level 3 Component Global Albedo publicly available product in netCDF format covering a day. Version Description: Created Version 006 ESDT to be applied to the publicly available MISR Level 3 Component Global Albedo products covering a day starting with MISR Release V3.2.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This file contains the global albedo product binned in netCDF format covering a day
